item.title: Sport24.co.za | Kohli simply the best - AB de Villiers
item.description: India captain Virat Kohli leads his team into the Champions Trophy final against bitter rivals Pakistan with SA star AB de Villiers labelling him "the outstanding cricketer in the world".

item.title: News24.com | UN says aid to 9 million Syrian children in peril
item.description: Unicef is warning that a critical funding shortfall is threatening aid to nine million Syrian children, both in their country and in neighbouring states.

item.title: News24.com | Mugabe orders reduction in roadblocks... but will it really happen?
item.description: President Robert Mugabe has reportedly ordered police to reduce the number of roadblocks, which put off tourists and anger locals Zimbabweans because of the demands for bribes and fines.

item.title: News24.com | Mystery surrounds Pietermaritzburg stabbing
item.description: A man has died after being stabbed in Pietermaritzburg, with paramedics saying a group of 20 to 30 people had been surrounding the body when they arrived at the scene.

item.title: News24.com | Shooting rampage spans nearly 300km, 5 dead
item.description: A man accused of killing three family members and two other people in a shooting rampage that spanned nearly 300km in New Mexico, has been captured after a chase and a crash.

item.title: Channel24.co.za | Siv Ngesi on Winginâ€™ It, traveling the world, and yes, those bum pics
item.description: Sivuyile Ngesi is South African television's undisputed Energiser bunny - a TV presenter with a six pack and unrivalled energy that sees him going, going and going.

item.title: Sport24.co.za | WRAP: June Internationals
item.description: A comprehensive wrap of all of the weekend's June Internationals from around the rugby globe.

item.title: News24.com | One-time Niagara Falls survivor dies after apparent repeat stunt - reports
item.description: The first person to survive a death-defying plunge into Niagara Falls without protection has died after apparently attempting the feat again in an inflatable ball, according to US media.

item.title: News24.com | One dead in 'high-speed' Durban crash
item.description: One person has died following a high-speed crash in which a car smashed into a taxi in Durban.

item.title: News24.com | Battle for affordable breast cancer treatment continues
item.description: The announcement of a Competition Commission probe into the price of cancer-treating drugs has given momentum to a fight that activist Tobeka Daki devoted the last part of her life to.

item.title: Traveller24.com | #HopeForKnysna: 3 Aftermath videos you have to see
item.description: Now more than ever Knysna needs to be on your itinerary,

item.title: News24.com | Shot US congressman still 'critical' but improving: doctor
item.description: Top US Republican lawmaker Steve Scalise remains hospitalised in critical condition after being shot this week, but he has improved, his surgeon says.

item.title: Channel24.co.za | Katy Perry makes Twitter history as first ever to reach 100 million followers
item.description: Pop superstar Katy Perry has made history by becoming the first user to garner 100 million followers on Twitter, the social media platform announced.

item.title: News24.com | At least 2 000 Zim students 'go without water for 2 months'
item.description: Up to 2 000 students are without water at a leading polytechnic in southern Zimbabwe after the state water authority cut off supplies to the town of Gwanda, a report says.

item.title: News24.com | Tower block fire protesters storm town hall
item.description: Dozens of people attending an angry protest for victims of the Grenfell Tower fire tragedy in London have stormed the local town hall.

item.title: News24.com | SA buries 200-year-old 'spirit' of rebel chief
item.description: South Africa has buried the "spirit" of one of its first rebel leaders, 200 years after his death in Australia, where his bones were never found.

item.title: News24.com | 18-month-old killed in accident
item.description: An 18-month-old boy who was sitting with his mother on the passenger seat of a car which overturned near Durban, has died after being pinned under the vehicle.

item.title: News24.com | Morocco's OCP slams SA decision to hold phosphate ship
item.description: Morocco's OCP group has denounced a decision by a South African court to hold a Moroccan ship laden with phosphate mined from the disputed Western Sahara pending a trial.

item.title: News24.com | Noiseless river 'bubble' taxi sails through Paris test
item.description: An odd-looking electric boat taxi whose inventor believes it could be an eco-friendly transport solution for cities worldwide has been put to the test in Paris.

item.title: News24.com | Seven US destroyer crew missing after collision: Japan coastguard
item.description: A US Navy destroyer has collided with a Philippine-flagged container ship off the coast of Japan, leaving seven crew from the American vessel unaccounted for, the Japanese Coast Guard says.
